DOC.brief_summary: To obtain subjective objective feedback clinical performance Biofinity lenses least two week daily wear exist contact lens wearer compare habitual lens .
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Dispensing Study Biofinity Lenses Extended Range
DOC.criteria: Has oculovisual examination last two year Is least 18 year age full legal capacity volunteer Has read understood information consent letter Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule Is correctable visual acuity 20/50 better ( least one eye ) habitual vision correction Currently wear soft contact lenses They require contact lens power 12.00 20.00D +8.00 +15.00D Has clear cornea active ocular disease Demonstrates acceptable fit study lens . Has systemic disease affect ocular health Is take medication , antihistamine eye drop , oral ophthalmic betaadrenergic blocker ( e.g . Propanolol , Timolol ) , anticholinergic , prescribe overthecounter eye medication , except artificial tear eye lubricant Have active ocular disease and/or infection would contraindicate contact lens wear . Active ocular disease define infection inflammation require therapeutic treatment . Mild ( i.e . consider clinically relevant ) lid abnormality ( blepharitis , meibomian gland dysfunction , papilla ) , corneal conjunctival stain dry eye consider active ocular disease . Neovascularization corneal scar result previous hypoxia , infection inflammation therefore active . Has wear gas permeable contact lenses within last month . Is aphakic Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type clinical research study Female currently pregnant breastfeed .
